title: Implement jit claim acquire command
description:
Implement `jit claim acquire <issue-id>` with `--ttl <seconds>` and `--agent-id <id>` options. Return lease ID on success, clear error if already claimed. Support `--json` output.

## TTL=0 Support
When `--ttl 0`, require `--reason <text>` flag and enforce:
- Repository policy permits indefinite leases
- Per-agent limit: max_indefinite_leases_per_agent
- Per-repository limit: max_indefinite_leases_per_repo

See design doc sections "New Commands" and "TTL=0 constraints".
